actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to pay a portion of the cost of corrective work on the Starvation Reservoir Bridge, Utah.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to pay $326,600, representing a portion of the cost of corrective work on the Starvation Reservoir Bridge, Utah.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to pay a portion of the cost of corrective work on the Starvation Reservoir Bridge, Utah.
